B2 able to do things effectively and skilfully, and to achieve results: She's a very capable woman/worker/judge. We need to get an assistant who's capable and efficient. Synonyms
adept
competent
expert
good
proficient
skilful UK capable of something/doing something
B2 having the ability, power, or qualities to be able to do something: Only the Democratic Party is capable of running the country.
